description: This pretty Kent based village is located just west of Ashford. Local walking highlights include the pleasant trails around Hothfield Common and the peaceful woodland at Dering Woods . Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Bethersden. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
